    • Method Detail

      • rebuild

        public void rebuild()
        This rebuilds the world entirely. It resets the world's name to the original, updates the file manager's world directory, game configuration world name, and regenerates/loads the chunks.

      • render

        public void render()
        This simply renders the chunks.

      • renderTopObjects

        public void renderTopObjects()

      • update

        public void update(double delta)
        This simply updates the chunks.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        This saves the world and disposes of the chunks.

      • worldToChunkCoordinates

        public Vector2d worldToChunkCoordinates(double x,
                                        double y)
        Get the chunk-coordinates from a world position.
        Parameters:
        x - The world X-position.
        y - The world Y-position.
        Returns:
        The chunk-coordinates.

      • getChunk

        public Chunk getChunk(double x,
                      double y)
        Get the chunk at position (x, y) (x, y, are world coordinates).
        Parameters:
        x - The world X-coordinate to get chunk at.
        y - The world Y-coordinate to get chunk at.
        Returns:
        The chunk at (x, y).

      • getTile

        public int getTile(double x,
                   double y)
        Get the id of tile at (x, y).
        Parameters:
        x - The world X-coordinate to get tile at.
        y - The world Y-coordinate to get tile at.
        Returns:
        The tile id at (x, y).

        Parameters:
        x - The X-coordinate of tile.
        y - The Y-coordinate of tile.
        type - The id of the tile to set.
